long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide Images is a simple and efficient extension that lets you toggle the visibility of all images on any webpage instantly.

Key Features:
• Hide both regular images and background images with one click
• Show images again just as easily
• Works on any website
• Lightweight and fast
• No data collection or tracking
• Perfect for:
  - Reducing distractions while reading
  - Saving data on limited connections
  - Improving page load times
  - Making text-heavy content more readable
  - Focusing on written content

How to use:
1. Click the extension icon in your toolbar
2. A box with hide images button will be displayed.
2. Click on "Hide Images" and images will be hidden instantly
3. Click again to show images

This extension is open source and respects your privacy - it doesn't collect any data or require any permissions beyond what's needed to function.
